item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Container Storage v2.1.0 now with Elastic SAN integration and on demand installation
item.description:
Azure Container Storage v2.1.0 is generally available, adding native Elastic SAN support and a lightweight onâ€‘demand installation model to simplify deployment and operations for Kubernetes workloads on Azure.

  • Source: Azure Updates
